name: The $1,000,000 Pyramid
overview: The $10,000 Pyramid debuted in 1973 and went on to became one of the most popular game shows on TV. This version for Wii takes the same classic Pyramid play and adds a few more zeroes to the jackpot! Pick from six categories, then guess words or phrases from that category based on the clues your teammate gives you. Outscore your opponents and earn a trip to the Winner's Circle, where you'll have a chance to win the $1,000,000 prize. Survive 20 single-player episodes or go-head-to-head with a friend in Party Mode. There are over 4800 clues in 800 categories, more than enough to keep you guessing!
